author: Staff Reporter
text:
A devotee, who was on a padayatra to offer prayers at Irukkankudi temple, was killed and four others, who accompanied him, suffered injuries, after an unidentified vehicle hit them near Eppodhum Vendran on Saturday.

The deceased was identified as G. Lakshmanan (16) of Vishwapuram.

The injured were N. Sathish (16) of Gandhi Nagar, Veerapandiyanpattinam, Mariammal (60), wife of Shanmugam, Ayyapan Nagar, Tuticorin, M. Ramkumar (16) of Vishwapuram, Tuticorin and G. Ramar (16) of the same locality. They were admitted to Thoothukudi Government Medical College Hospital. Based on a complaint lodged by M. Thangamariappan (35) of Vishwapuram, Tuticorin, Eppodhum Vendran police have filed a case.
title: Devotee on padayatra killed
